key_facts: Heavy rainfall and flooding will become more frequent due to climate change.
Storm Bert caused significant disruption and fatalities in the UK.
Dr Leanne Archer warns heavier rainfall events will increase in intensity.
Increased rainfall raises the likelihood of flooding.
Experts call for future-proofing flood defences.
Engineered and natural flood solutions are needed.
Homes near floodplains are especially at risk.
Governments are investing in renewable energy and flood resilience.
Environmental agencies are also supporting flood strategies.
No flood defence can offer permanent protection.
Ambitious climate targets are needed to address climate impacts.
Community-level preparedness is crucial for climate adaptation.
